conversation.text:
Batman is a classic first contact movie that perfectly captures the essence of the genre. The plot follows the enigmatic Batman as he uncovers a criminal conspiracy, showcasing the thrilling and suspenseful nature of the genre.

Another great option is War Horse, a powerful and poignant film about a soldier's journey to save his horse during World War I. The film offers a poignant exploration of human resilience and the human-animal bond.

Paradise Lost is a thrilling and suspenseful thriller about a group of reality show contestants stranded on a deserted island. The film perfectly captures the thrills and chills of a classic first contact movie.
